text: Christophe Cuvillier (born 5 December 1962) is the former chairman and former CEO of Unibail-Rodamco-Westfield.Christophe Cuvillier During his career he worked for Lancôme, L'OréalChristophe Cuvillier and the Fnac.Christophe Cuvillier, président de la Fnac : le l'oréalien qui secoue l'agitateur culturel He graduated from HEC Paris in 1984.CHRISTOPHE CUVILLIER == References == Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Alumni of HEC Paris Category:French businesspeople
title: Christophe Cuvillier
